overview:
Who we are

dotDEzine (formerly named PakGraph) is a strongly established and well known company brand name within the organize exhibition, competition audio video production house, web development, software development, content management, hosting services, SEO Experts , CCTV Solutions & domain registration market, extremely experienced in providing high quality solutions for companies around the world. The recipe: “to combine high quality and easy to use services with professional customer service at an unbelievable low cost”.

dotDEzine has based its strategy in core values such as clear communication with its customers, constant improvement of the portfolio of services and, of course, an extremely tight collaboration with technological leaders within the IT market. At the same time, dotDEzine has always encouraged users to be self sufficient in relation with their businesses and web pages, in one word, we want our customers to have full control over their sites, even if they don’t have a deep IT knowledge.
